attributes.title: The End of the PS4 Begins
attributes.description: Sony's discontinuing most of the PS4 models in Japan, so start the funeral! Plus, Nintendo buys the developer of Luigi's Mansion 3!

attributes.description: Blessing and Imran discuss a new leak detailing more of what we can expect from the rumored Switch Pro console.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim kick off the week by talking about what Lucasfilm Games means for Star Wars and more.

attributes.description: On his FINAL Whitta Wednesday Gary joins Greg to talk about the Star Wars games that could be, the ESA PAC stopping political donations, and more!

attributes.description: Greg and Tim rant about Cyberpunk 2077, Pokemon Snap, and more!

attributes.description: Carolyn Petit joins Greg to talk about the best selling games of 2020, December's NPD numbers, and Bungie really, really saying goodbye to Halo.

attributes.description: Greg and Tim tackle #GameStop's stock, Robinhood's ban, and more. (More is a lot of #MarvelsAvengers talk.)

attributes.description: Blessing and Imran talk about PS5 sales numbers, Embracer Group acquiring Gearbox, and more!

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim talk about a secret Halo game in the works, Shadow of Mordor's nemesis system being patented, and more.

attributes.description: Gary Whitta and Greg talk about Anthem's deadline, CD Projekt getting hacked, and so much more!

attributes.description: The #E32021 hype continues as we break down everything from Elden Ring's reveal, talk about Ubisoft's tv show plans, and get excited about Jedi Fallen Order's next-gen update.

attributes.description: Yes, your PS4 save works. Yes, there's a paid upgrade path, Yes, you're getting the Half Life and Cyberpunk content. Let's talk about Death Stranding Director's Cut, Sifu, and PlayStation's State of Play with Patrick Shanley!

attributes.description: Janet and Tim breakdown the latest on Kojima, Abandoned, the most expensive video game ever, and Cyberpunk 2077's surprising download numbers.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim kick off the week discussing the possibility of Death Stranding 2, Suda 51 wanting to make a Deadpool game, and more.

attributes.description: Tamoor Hussain and Gary Whitta unite in a VERY british episode of KFGD! Let's talk Gotham Knights, Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League, and Metal Gear Online.

attributes.description: Blessing and Andy talk about the Dead Space remake, Final Fantasy VXI & Xbox at Tokyo Games Show, and more.

attributes.title: Game Boy Titles Coming to Nintendo Switch!?
attributes.description: Blessing and Tim talk about Game Boy and Game Boy Color games coming to Nintendo Switch Online, bad news for the semiconductor shortage, and more!

attributes.description: Gary Whitta and Greg talk about PlayStation reversing course on Horizon Forbidden West's upgrade plan, Tripwire Interactive's terrible weekend, and Alan Wake Remastered!

attributes.description: Blessing and Andy talk about PlayStation big new acquisition of Firesprite, Avengers roadmap, and a BUNCH of reviews that just dropped.

attributes.description: Greg and Tim talk about last minute PlayStation Showcase predictions, Crash's birthday, and if the Matrix movies are good or bad.

attributes.description: Greg and Bless talk about Epic's win over (and loss to) Apple, the PlayStation Showcase, and more!

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim talk about all these Deathloop reviews, Fortnite's new season being cube shaped, and more!

attributes.description: Gary Whitta and Greg talk about if Insomniac and Marvel Games will go for the M rating on Wolverine, PS5's new firmware, and a couple of game delays!

attributes.description: Blessing and Andy talk about a HUGE leak from Nvidia GeForce Now, Bluetooth coming to Nintendo Switch, and more!

attributes.description: Tamoor Hussain and Blessing talk Battlefield 2042, Deltarune Chapter 2, and more!

attributes.title: God of War Ragnarok Is the End (Kinda)
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing rant about THQ Nordic for a while, talk about God of War: Ragnarok ending the Norse saga, and drink beer... at 10:29 am. You make this happen; I hope you're proud of yourself.

attributes.title: Star Wars Game From Detroit: Become Human Studio!?
attributes.description: Blessing and Tim talk about a possible Quantic Dream Star Wars game, Balenciaga coming to Fortnite, and more!

attributes.description: Tim and Gary go over the Kena Bridge of Spirits reviews, the latest on Halo Infinite's test flights, Activision's legal situation, and more!

attributes.description: Tam and Tim go over the Death Stranding Director's Cut reviews, SEGA closing its arcade, the future of Titanfall, the Nintendo Direct, and more!

attributes.description: Naughty Dog says we're getting new The Last of Us content this weekend, but what does that mean? Greg and Bless discuss!

attributes.description: Greg and Tim dive into the Hot Wheels Unleashed reviews, our first look at The Last of Us on HBO, and more!

attributes.description: Greg and Gary Whitta talk about the success and Day 1 struggles of New World, Activision/Blizzard's settlement, and Donkey Kong coming to Super Nintendo World.

attributes.description: Greg and SnowBikeMike talk about how dark the Spider-Man 2 story will be, what's going on with the New World, and more!

attributes.description: Tam and Andy talk about the reason behind God of Wars Ragnarok's delay, Sony acquiring Bluepoint, Xbox at TGS, and more!

attributes.description: Greg and Janet welcome Spooky Season by talking about Konami's return to AAA games with rumors of Metal Gear Solid, Castlevania, and more!

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim (and an invading Greg) talk about the INTERESTING reveal of a Friday The 13th video game from Illfonic of Predator Hunting Grounds and Friday The 13th fame.

attributes.description: Greg, Tam, and Tim come together to talk about Sora in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, The Walking Dead coming back to Fortnite, and more!

attributes.description: Janet and Tim go over Eidos-Montreal making the move to a 4 day work week, Randy Pitchford stepping down as Gearbox Software President, Amazon's reaction to New World's success, and more!

attributes.title: Remastered GTA Trilogy Is Finally Official
attributes.description: Janet and Blessing talk GTA Remastered, California's plans to object to Activision settlement, and the fact that PlayStation will seemingly announced a remake of a big game this Christmas.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim kick off the week talking about Metroid Dread sales in the UK, Metal Gear Solid 3 remake rumors picking up steam, and more.

attributes.description: Tim and Andy talk about what Star Wars game announcement could happen in December, Switch OLED sales, and a new studio called Possibility Space.

attributes.description: Tam and Blessing talk about the impressive sales of Metroid Dread strange practices at its developer, as well as Switch OLED sales, and Battlefield's future.

attributes.description: Blessing and Janet talk about a BIG day for Animal Crossing fans and a controversial one for Nintendo Switch Online subscribers.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tam cover a HUGE news day. New Splinter Cell Finally?? Big Xbox news and EA opens a new studio!

attributes.description: Tam and Tim discuss the Uncharted trailer, the latest updates on Halo Infinite, and the outrageous prices of Xbox's SSD cards.

attributes.description: Blessing and Janet tackle a big news day: Grand Theft Auto Trilogy Definitive Edition gameplay reveal, a new State of Play coming next week, and more!

attributes.description: Tim, Andy, and Mike break down the Halo Infinite Campaign trailer, the reviews of Guardians of the Galaxy and Age of Empires 4, the latest in Fortnite, and updates on Horizon Forbidden West!

attributes.description: Blessing and Janet unite on a rare TUESDAY and break down some hot PlayStation news including Returnal and Kena... and A Quiet Place video game?

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim tackle a hefty news day with a new Pikmin game launching, Blizzcon canceled, N64 games for Switch leaked, and much more.

attributes.description: Tim and Tam discuss the progress made by Activision Blizzard employees, PlayStation embracing PC, and much more.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim talk about a Sega & Microsoft collaboration, Roger does a review for Unpacking, and an unnamed fan is very broken up about trophies in the Bugsnax DLC.

attributes.description: Blessing and Gary talk about what's up with the next Smash Bros, New World currencies, and the influence of GTA III.

attributes.description: Blessing and Andy tackle a HUGE day of news with Overwatch 2 and Diablo IV getting delayed, Jen Oneal stepping down from Blizzard, Elden Ring gameplay incoming, Donkey Kong moving coming, and more!

attributes.title: GTA Publisher Has 62 Games In Development
attributes.description: Tim and Tam take on a big news day where superhero games take multiple Ls, Nintendo gets big Ws, and Take-Two says it has a lot of games in development.

attributes.title: Nintendo: Next Console, Improving Online, Acquiring Studios
attributes.description: Blessing and Janet round out the news day with a BUNCH of Nintendo news. Let's hear what Nintendo has to say about their next console, Nintendo Online, acquiring studios, and more.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim discuss the new Horizon: Forbidden West gameplay deep-dive, Mass Effect 4 tease, and more!

attributes.description: Blessing and Gary talk about Pokemon Brilliant Diamond and Shining Pearl leaks, Sonic Frontiers leaks, the next 3D Mario game and a cool looking game called Lies of P.

attributes.description: Tim and Andy discuss Phil Spencer's tweets about Forza Horizon 5, EA Sports potentially bringing Fight Night back, and some light Star Wars Jedi Fallen Order Sequel updates.

attributes.description: Tim and Tam discuss two unannounced Xbox games that have been leaked, Steam Deck Delays, Naruto coming to Fortnite, and more.

attributes.description: Blessing and Janet talk about a Halo Infinite rumor, GTA Trilogy's PC release, and more!

attributes.description: Tim and Gary go over The Game Awards Nominees, the latest on the horrible Activision Blizzard situation, and Halo Infinite's record breaking day one!

attributes.description: Blessing and Janet unite to once again talk about GTA trilogy along with Halo Infinite campaign expectations, if Xbox could delist Call of Duty, and more.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim kick off the week with a banger news day. Let's talk about Spider-Man gameplay in Marvel's Avengers, Horizon Forbidden West details and more!

attributes.description: Gary and Tamoor offer an update on the Activision Blizzard situation, as well as noisy Xbox mini-fridges, and more.

attributes.title: Marvel MMO From DC Universe Online Developer!?
attributes.description: Blessing and Tim are back from break with a lot of news to discuss! Let's talk about a new Marvel MMO, Xbox Series S sales, Geoff Keighley teasing Game Awards announcements, and more!

attributes.description: Gary and Tam talk about the GTA Remaster patch, and why Rockstar allowed the games to be released like this, as well as Halo Infinite updates, and more.

attributes.description: Forbes' 30 Under 30's Blessing Adeoye Jr. and Fanbyte's Michael Higham talk about Solar Ash reviews, Mercury Steam's next game, what's happening in Final Fantasy 14 and more.

attributes.description: Tim and Tam cover the big things happening at EA with Battlefield, as well as the cancelled Need for Speed TV show and more.

attributes.description: Janet and special guest Rebekah Valentine of IGN discuss PlayStation's reported subscription service, Take-Two going after It Takes Two, and more!

attributes.description: Blessing and Tim kick off this week with a HUGE news day. Let's talk about Halo Infinite reviews, Spider-Man and The Rock coming to Fortnite, The Matrix Unreal Engine 5 demo and more!

attributes.description: Blessing and Andy talk about the Grand Theft Auto V Online expansion that features the return of Franklin, Halo Infinite's delay woes and more!

attributes.description: Janet and Tim break down the last minute Game Awards updates, the strike against Activision, Halo's new trademarks, and more!

attributes.description: Jared Petty RETURNS to talk to Tim all about every winner and reveal from The Game Awards 2021.

attributes.description: Blessing and Tam talk about Nintendo's surprise Indie World Presentation, Halo playlist updates, and more.

attributes.description: Blessing and Andy tackle a HUGE news day with Splinter Cell Remake announced by Ubisoft, SIFU previews, Nintendo Indie World recap, and more!

attributes.description: Tim and Tam talk about new Splinter Cell remake info, changes at Bungie, Square Enix struggling to cope with Final Fantasy XIV's popularity, and more!

attributes.title: What Was The Biggest Gaming News Story of 2021?
attributes.description: Blessing and Janet close out the year with one last KFGD of 2021. Let's talk about the biggest news of the year, Tencent acquiring Back 4 Blood's dev, NFT things, and more.
